messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: Ha, Ha!!!  I did the same thing when the kids and I started talking about this.... I ran and found that book, and we made one, and then realized this was a
messages.messageBody:
Ha, Ha!!!  I did the same thing when the kids and I started talking about this....
I ran and found that book, and we made one, and then realized this was a boat, not a hat!!  :)
Ooops!
Oh well.
A friend has a birthday today, so we were making her a hat!
Anyway, I make them from the Family.com site  that someone sent.  They are great!!!  Very easy, and i am not talented at all in the crafting dept.  I didn't have masking tape, but did have that blue tape from taping windows I was painting.  That worked great.  I also didn't have much to decorate, so i just fringed the floppy hat, and we used glitter to write their names.  They turned out very cute, and were a huge hit at science class today.
Thanks everyone for all of your help.  I now have to go make hats for two teddy bears and a baby doll.  :)
Ann
